statements: SELECT * FROM feedback_notifications WHERE is_read = TRUE;
SELECT feedback_id, notification_text FROM feedback_notifications WHERE notification_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT notification_id, notification_text, notification_time FROM feedback_notifications ORDER BY notification_time DESC;
SELECT feedback_id FROM feedback_notifications WHERE notification_time < '2022-06-01' AND is_read = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM feedback_notifications WHERE notification_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM feedback_notifications WHERE is_read = FALSE;
SELECT notification_id, notification_text FROM feedback_notifications WHERE feedback_id = 10 ORDER BY notification_time DESC;
SELECT notification_id, notification_text, notification_time FROM feedback_notifications WHERE notification_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM feedback_notifications WHERE notification_text LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY notification_time ASC;

SELECT AVG(feedback_id) AS average_feedback_id, COUNT(notification_id) AS notification_count FROM feedback_notifications GROUP BY feedback_id HAVING AVG(feedback_id) > 5 ORDER BY notification_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, created_at FROM feedback ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT notification_text FROM feedback_notifications WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT feedback_id, notification_text, sent_at FROM feedback_notifications;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, created_at FROM feedback WHERE feedback_id > 5 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, notification_text FROM feedback JOIN feedback_notifications ON feedback.feedback_id = feedback_notifications.feedback_id WHERE sent_at > '2021-01-01';

SELECT feedback_id, COUNT(notification_id) AS num_notifications FROM feedback JOIN feedback_notifications ON feedback.feedback_id = feedback_notifications.feedback_id GROUP BY feedback_id HAVING num_notifications > 3;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS num_feedbacks FROM feedback GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY num_feedbacks DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_table;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_table ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_table WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_id FROM feedback_table WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM email_notification WHERE sent_status = TRUE ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_table WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM feedback_table WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT feedback_id, COUNT(*) FROM feedback_table GROUP BY feedback_id;
SELECT * FROM email_notification WHERE user_id = 500 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT trigger_name, action, trigger_condition FROM notification_trigger WHERE table_affected = 'email_notification';
SELECT * FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT notification_text, time_stamp FROM notifications ORDER BY time_stamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, user_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (2, 3, 5);
SELECT trigger_name, table_name, action FROM triggers WHERE trigger_condition = 'AFTER INSERT';
SELECT * FROM feedback ORDER BY time_stamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT notification_text FROM notifications WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY time_stamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM triggers WHERE table_name = 'feedback';
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT id, user_id, created_at FROM feedback;
SELECT message, created_at FROM feedback WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT notification_id, message FROM notifications WHERE seen = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM feedback ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT message, user_id FROM feedback WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM feedback GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE seen = true AND user_id = 5;
SELECT DISTINCT table_name FROM triggers;
